modName: Demon Hunter Armor for Dream Girl
summary: This is a conversion of jmenaru\'s Demon Hunter Armor, and Demon Hunter Armor V2, converted to fit Petrovich\'s Dream Girl body replacer, with four new colors.
descriptionHtml:
Demon Hunter Armor for Dream Girl
Author(s): Shayaryn and jmenaru

Description: This is a conversion of jmenaru Demon Hunter Armor, and Demon Hunter Armor V2, converted to fit Petrovich\'s Dream Girl body replacer, with three new colors. The armor can be crafted at a forge, and can be improved and enchanted. 

Update 1.1: 
Added the Chilled color variant, courtesy of Danariel. 
1.2
And scarves, which I kind of forgot to add until right after I updated the new version. Oops.

Requirements: 
Petrovich\'s Dream Girl body mesh, and any UNP-compatable body textures.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/41443//?

jmenaru\'s original textures are required to use this mod. Download them here:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27060//?
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29419//?

Installation notes:
Install jmenaru\'s mods first, and then install this version. You only need the .esp from this mod; everything is in there. If you do not install the original textures, the armor will not display properly.


Credits and permissions:
Petrovich for his Dream Girl body replacer.
jmenaru for his Demon Hunter Armor and Demon Hunter Armor V2 mods.

You may use my textures as you wish, but you must obtain permission from jmenaru if you intend to upload any of his content.
author: Shayaryn and jmenaru
